nameAlsoCn: 席纹状神经束膜纤维瘤
definitionCn: 一种罕见的,几乎总是良性的肿瘤,完全由肿瘤性神经周细胞组成。 它可能发生在软组织,神经内或粘膜部位。
definitionEn: A rare, almost always benign tumor composed entirely of neoplastic perineurial cells. It may occur in the soft tissues, intraneurally or in mucosal sites.
DifferentialDiagnosis:
The differential diagNOSis for intraneural perineuriomas includes 2:
other neurogenic tumours:
neurofibroma
schwannoma
malignant peripheral nerve sheath tumour
chronic inflammatory polyneuropathy (CIDP)
hereditary motor and sensory neuropathy (HMSN)
Dejerine-Sottas disease
Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease

name: EpithelioidHaemangioendothelioma
上皮样血管内皮细胞瘤

MRIImageDescription: Intraneural perineuriomas appear as fusiform enlargement of a nerve with increased T2 signal and contrast enhancement
DifferentialDiagnosisInCN:
神经内膜神经鞘瘤的鉴别诊断包括：
其他神经源性肿瘤：神经纤维瘤、神经鞘瘤、恶性外周神经鞘瘤、慢性炎性多发性神经病（CIDP）、遗传性运动和感觉神经病（HMSN）、Dejerine-Sottas病、Charcot-Marie-Tooth疾病

d105: T1W sequences with contrast and fat saturation show a fusiform avidly enhancing mass lesion in the anterolateral left arm along the distal humeral segment of the radial nerve (short arrows).
T1W序列与对照和脂肪饱和度呈梭状，在桡骨远端肱骨远端(短箭头)的前外侧左臂上明显增强肿块病变。
d106: axial T2W sequence (a) shows a fusiform lesion within the right psoas muscle along the course of the right femoral nerve (long arrow) at the level of L5-S1.
轴向T2W序列(a)显示右腰肌内的梭状病灶，沿右股骨神经(长箭头)在L5-S1水平。
